title: How to Get, Awaken, and Use the Dough Fruit in Blox Fruits: Pro Guide

steps.title: Dough Fruit can be purchased from the Blox Fruit Dealer.
steps.content: Dough Fruit can be purchased from the Blox Fruit Dealer. A Dough Fruit costs $2,800,000 (in-game currency) or 2,400 Robux. [1] X Research source You can find a Blox Fruit Dealer on the Pirate Starter Island, Marine Starter Island, Middle Town, Kingdom of Rose Docks, Cafe, Mansion, and Port Town. 2,400 Robux will cost about $30 to purchase as of April 2024.

steps.title: It costs 18,500 fragments to fully awaken a Dough Fruit.
steps.content: It costs 18,500 fragments to fully awaken a Dough Fruit. The awakening order and fragment cost of each skill is as follows: Z: 500 fragments F: 2,000 fragments X: 3,000 fragments C: 4,000 fragments Left click: 4,000 fragments V: 5,000 fragments

steps.title: You must unlock the Dough Raid to awaken your Dough Fruit.
steps.content: You must unlock the Dough Raid to awaken your Dough Fruit. Follow these steps to unlock the Dough Raid: Obtain 1 God's Chalice and 10 Conjured Cocoas. You can get the God's Chalice from praying at the Gravestone or defeating Elite Pirates, and you can get Conjured Cocoas from defeating Cocoa Warriors or Chocolate Bar Battlers. Trade the God's Chalice and 10 Conjured Cocoas for a Sweet Chalice. You can do this via the Sweet Crafter located in Chocolate Land in the Sea of Treats. Defeat 500 enemy NPCs in Cake Land. Talk to the NPC drip_mama in front of the large mirror in the middle of Cake Land to check how many enemies you've killed. Once you've killed 500 enemies and spoken to drip_mama, the Dough King will appear. Defeat the Dough King. If you do at least 10% damage, you'll get a Red Key. The Red Key unlocks the door inside Candy Castle and gives you access to the Cake Scientist. The Cake Scientist sells Dough Raid Microchips, which cost 1,000 fragments or 1 fruit worth at least $1 million in-game money.

steps.title: Elemental Reflex (passive).
steps.content: Elemental Reflex (passive). The Dough Fruit's passive, Elemental Reflex, renders you immune to all physical attacks from players without an Aura and lower-level NPCs.

steps.title: Fried Dough (normal Z).
steps.content: Fried Dough (normal Z). Shoots a ball of fried dough at the enemy. If the dough ball hits the ground or its max range, it will explode and deal AOE damage. If you hit an enemy's hitbox, it will push them back. Getting hit by the AOE damage breaks instinct.

steps.title: Sticky Dough (normal X).
steps.content: Sticky Dough (normal X). Creates a lasso of dough. If the lasso hits an enemy, they will be grabbed, lifted into the air, and thrown down onto the ground. This does not break instinct.

steps.title: Carved Dough (normal C).
steps.content: Carved Dough (normal C). Turns the user into a donut. When the user releases the C key, their hand will turn into a fried dough club that knocks targets into the air and breaks instinct.

steps.title: Restless Dough Barrage (normal V).
steps.content: Restless Dough Barrage (normal V). Makes dough rings around the target. Fists come out of these rings and hit any target in range, leaving enemies stunned with broken instinct. The longer V is held, the more times the fists will hit.

steps.title: Roller Donut (normal F).
steps.content: Roller Donut (normal F). Turns the user into a donut. The more HP you have, the longer you can roll. You can't roll over water.

steps.title: Summon donut (awakened left click).
steps.content: Summon donut (awakened left click). When clicking on a target, a donut is summoned that punches at the location of the cursor click. The longer you hold down the mouse button, the more damage the enemy takes and the farther the fist punches.

steps.title: Missile Jab (awakened Z).
steps.content: Missile Jab (awakened Z). The same as Fried Dough, but you're now flung back slightly if you hold down Z longer.

steps.title: Pastry River (awakened X).
steps.content: Pastry River (awakened X). If used on the ground, it summons a dough statue from the ground, flinging the enemy into the air. When the enemy falls to the ground, they will be stunned. If used in the air, the user stretches out their arm and hits the enemy with a flurry of punches until ultimately smacking the enemy to the ground.

steps.title: Piercing Clothesline (awakened C).
steps.content: Piercing Clothesline (awakened C). Turns the user into a spiked donut. Any enemies hit by the donut are stuck to the spikes and are stunned. Then, the user swings their arms in the air and smashes the enemy into the ground.

steps.title: Dough Fist Fusillade (awakened V).
steps.content: Dough Fist Fusillade (awakened V). Similar to Restless Dough Barrage, but the user cannot move when using this skill. The move will be canceled if the user gets hurt.

steps.title: Scorching Donut (awakened F).
steps.content: Scorching Donut (awakened F). Similar to Roller Donut, but the user can traverse water, lava, and walls. You can roll as a donut infinitely, but it costs 25 energy to activate and use this skill.
